function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Migration from urban to rural areas due to lack of space in multi-family housing","Impact":"Decreased population density in urban areas, potential strain on infrastructure in rural areas","Mitigation":"Developing flexible housing solutions, improving infrastructure in urban areas","Technologies":"Smart home technology, urban planning software","People":"City planners, urban developers, residents","Owner":"City planning authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient adequacy, equipment, flexibility, and adaptability of existing housing in the context of pandemic challenges","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, decreased well-being of residents","Mitigation":"Redefining housing planning and design, implementing flexible and adaptive housing solutions","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, modular housing design","People":"Architects, urban planners, housing developers","Owner":"Housing development companies"},{"Description":"Survey revealing inadequate conditions in multi-family housing in Podgorica","Impact":"Confirmation of inadequacy and lack of flexibility in housing design","Mitigation":"Implementing findings to improve housing conditions, redesigning residential areas","Technologies":"Survey software, architectural design software","People":"Survey participants, architects, city officials","Owner":"Housing development companies"}]}
